# datapower_assemblyactionratelimitinfo (Resource)

Rate limit details assembly action
  - CLI Alias: `assembly-rate-limit-info`

## Example Usage

```terraform

  id         = "AssemblyActionRateLimitInfo_name"
  app_domain = "acc_test_domain"
}
```
